'''2.1.16101''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and [[MCD:Launcher|Dungeons]]), '''2.1.16100''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.16102''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on July 22, 2020.

==Fixes==
* Fix Dungeons install location validation when determining if chosen location is under the Launcher installation path.
* {{bug|MCL-1440}}: Ignore a few system environment variables that could potentially restrict Minecraft resource utilization.
